alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 9:25PM CDT until May 17 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ottawa County in north central Kansas... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 925 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Simpson to 9 miles northeast of Ellsworth, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Minneapolis, Bennington, Delphos, Tescott, Culver, Wells, Niles and Ada. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
